system.description:
Summons a sylph, an elemental of the air, under the caster's control. There must be enough air in the area for the sylph to manifest. While the spell lasts the sylph will follow the caster's commands; once the spell ends the sylph dissipates back into the air.

Your GM will have details of sylphs. Each success in the margin add one dice to one of the sylph’s Resistances or Abilities.
